text: illeo galodoe naega neohuiege geugeosboda saaghan geos-eul illeojusa hananim-eulobuteo beol-i iss-eulila hananim-ui jeojuwa bunnoleul cholaehaneun geudeulgwa geudeul gaunde ilbuga wonsung ina dwaejilo hyeongsanghwa doen geudeulgwa usang-eul sungbaehaneun geudeul-inila ideul-eun gajang nappeun gos-eseo olbaleun gil-eulbeos-eona banghwanghalila
